author: amaltaro
body:
Fixes https://github.com/dmwm/WMCore/issues/10489

This PR provides the following changes:
* a new spec file for CouchDB 1.6.1, but this one will bring in python3 and py3-cmscouchapp dependency (instead of the python2 equivalent)
* removed the `python` dependency from the spidermonkey.spec file
* and made `wmagentpy3.spec` spec depend on the new CouchDB spec (based on python3 libraries)
title: Created new spec for CouchDB 1.6 with python3 CMSCouchapp
